SEARCH
Package it.team1Restaurant.bookings.calendar

Class CalendarBookings

java.lang.Object
it.team1Restaurant.bookings.calendar.CalendarBookings
public class CalendarBookings extends Object
This class is used to activate an interval of days, among witch is possible make bookings. It is possible to set a specific not working day or to set some default not working days for each week. It may be only one calendar, so this class is instantiated as a singleton.

  • Field Details

    • bookingsMap

      private Map<Day,List<Booking>> bookingsMap
      This map represents the current activated interval in which is possible make bookings. The keys are Day objects and, for each Day, the corresponding value is a List of Booking objects. In the constructor the Map is initialized as a TreeMap, with an assigned comparator that compares the Days only considering their date. In this way, is excluded the possibility that could be multiple keys with the same date. Furthermore the Map results automatically ordered by dates.

    • defaultNotWorkingDaysOfWeek

      private Set<DayOfWeek> defaultNotWorkingDaysOfWeek
      This is a Set that stores the @seeDayOfWeek selected as default not working days.

    • calendarBookings

      private static CalendarBookings calendarBookings

    • createBookedAtDate

      private String createBookedAtDate()
      This method is used to create the date on which the booking is made.
      Returns:
      The date on which the booking is made.

    • setWorkingDay

      public void setWorkingDay(LocalDate date, WorkingDayEnum workingDayToSet) throws Exception
      This method set the parameter workingDay of the Day in the bookingsMap corresponding to the date given in input. Pay attention: the date insert must be in the activate days, and if you want to change a day from WorkingDayEnum.WORKING to WorkingDayEnum.NOT_WORKING the corresponding list of the bookings must be empty!
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which you want to change the parameter workingDay.
      workingDayToSet - The new type to set in the target Day.
      Throws:
      DateOutOfCalendar - This method incurs in a DateOutOfCalendar if the date isn't activated in the bookingsMap.
      NotEmptyBookingsList - The method incurs in a NotEmptyBookingsList if you try to change a working day, whose corresponding bookings list is not empty, in a not working day.
      Exception

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking(Booking booking) throws Exception
      This method is used to add a booking to the bookingsMap.
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking to add into the bookingsMap.
      Throws:
      DateOutOfCalendar - This method incurs in a DateOutOfCalendar if the date isn't activated in the bookingsMap.
      Exception - This method incurs in an exception if the target day isn't a working day.

    • book

      public void book(Client client, List<Client> clientList, LocalDate date, LocalTime time) throws Exception
      This method is used to create a new Booking and add it to the bookingsMap using the method addBooking(it.team1Restaurant.bookings.calendar.Booking).
      Parameters:
      client - The client who is making the booking.
      clientList - The client list of the target booking.
      date - The target date of the booking.
      time - The target time of the booking.
      Throws:
      Exception - The exceptions are inherited from the method addBooking(it.team1Restaurant.bookings.calendar.Booking)

    • createBookingsIntervalFromStartDate

      public void createBookingsIntervalFromStartDate(LocalDate startDate, int numberOfDays)
      This method is used to activate a new interval in the bookingsMap. The new interval is generated starting from the startDate given in input, for the given number of days. If some days of the new interval are just present in the bookingsMap, they aren't substituted. If a day is present in the defaultNotWorkingDaysOfWeek, the days is set as not working day. Else, a new working day is created, and put in the bookingsMap with an empty bookingList.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The date from which you want to create the interval.
      numberOfDays - The number of days of the new interval.

    • createBookingsIntervalFromTwoDates

      public void createBookingsIntervalFromTwoDates(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      This method create a new interval, between two given dates, in the bookingsMap, using the method createBookingsIntervalFromStartDate(java.time.LocalDate, int)
      Parameters:
      startDate - The starting date.
      endDate - The ending date.

    • createBookingsIntervalFromNow

      public void createBookingsIntervalFromNow(int numberOfDays)
      This method creates a new interval, starting from the current date, for the given number of days. It uses the method createBookingsIntervalFromStartDate(java.time.LocalDate, int).
      Parameters:
      numberOfDays - The number of days of the new interval.

    • removeBookingsIntervalFromStartDate

      public void removeBookingsIntervalFromStartDate(LocalDate startDate, int numberOfDays) throws Exception
      This method removes from the bookingsMap the number of days specified, starting from the given startDate.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The starting date from which you would remove the days.
      numberOfDays - The number of days to remove.
      Throws:
      NotEmptyBookingsList - This method incurs in an exception if some of the days to remove presents a non empty bookingsList.
      DateOutOfCalendar - This method incurs in an exception if there is some day to remove out of the calendar.
      Exception

    • removeBookingsIntervalFromTwoDates

      public void removeBookingsIntervalFromTwoDates(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) throws Exception
      This method removes from the bookingsMap the number the interval between the two dates given in input, using the method removeBookingsIntervalFromStartDate(java.time.LocalDate, int).
      Parameters:
      startDate - The starting date of the interval to remove.
      endDate - The ending date of the interval to remove.
      Throws:
      Exception - The same exceptions of the method: removeBookingsIntervalFromStartDate(java.time.LocalDate, int).

    • addDefaultNotWorkingDayOfWeek

      public void addDefaultNotWorkingDayOfWeek(DayOfWeek dayOfWeek) throws Exception
      This method is used to set, in the bookingsMap, a default not working day for each week (for example Monday). Of course all the target days must present an empty bookingsList.
      Parameters:
      dayOfWeek - The @seeDayOfWeek to set as not working day.
      Throws:
      NotEmptyBookingsList - This method incurs in an exception if some of the target days presents a not empty bookingsList.
      Exception

    • removeDefaultNotWorkingDayOfWeek

      public void removeDefaultNotWorkingDayOfWeek(DayOfWeek dayOfWeek)
      This method is used to remove a default not working day of week.
      Parameters:
      dayOfWeek - The day of week to remove from the default not working days.

    • getBookingsListByDate

      public List<Booking> getBookingsListByDate(LocalDate date) throws DateOutOfCalendar
      This method returns the bookingsList present in the bookingsMap, corresponding to the given date.
      Parameters:
      date - The day of which you want to know the bookingsList.
      Returns:
      The bookingsList corresponding to tje given date.
      Throws:
      DateOutOfCalendar - If the given date is out of calendar.

    • getDayByDate

      public Day getDayByDate(LocalDate date) throws DateOutOfCalendar
      This method returns, if it is present, the Day in the bookingsMap corresponding to date given in input.
      Parameters:
      date - The day of which we want to get the corresponding Day.
      Returns:
      The Day corresponding to the date given in input.
      Throws:
      DateOutOfCalendar - If the date isn't in the bookingsMap.

    • getDayByDayOfWeekFromBookingsMap

      private Set<Day> getDayByDayOfWeekFromBookingsMap(DayOfWeek dayOfWeek)
      This method returns all the Days in the BookingsMap that corresponding to the
      Parameters:
      dayOfWeek - The day of week for which we want to know the Days is present in the bookingsMap.
      Returns:
      The Days that matches the given DayOfWeek.
      See Also:
      • DayOfWeek given in input.

    • checkDateInCalendar

      public boolean checkDateInCalendar(LocalDate date)
      This method check if the given date is present in the bookingsMap.
      Parameters:
      date - The target date.
      Returns:
      The method returns true if the date is in the bookingsMap, otherwise it returns false.
